summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a matter of confidentiality and attorney-client privilege. The email emphasizes the confidential nature of the communication and warns against unauthorized use or disclosure.

keyFacts: The email is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
The communication is intended only for the use of Jes Staley.
Unauthorized use, disclosure, or copying of the email is prohibited.
